string.text: Attention, tip! If now in the game options set is not 'static' light, it can happen crash to the desktop. Recommend to the time of the 'dungeon agricultural industry' to move to the 'static lighting'.
Access card can not be activated in this area.
Found critical content in the blood of toxins. Requires taking the drug 'Psihodelin' or a visit to a physician.
Warning! A fatal error occurred. Save, you just made - flew upside down. Continuation of the game impossible. Try to boot from an earlier save and go now another order.
More than three charges can not be set, because the controller does not support simultaneous detonation of four or more charges.
Unfortunately it is impossible to go to sleep now. SG was already asleep.
Unfortunately now sleep impossible, YY still not tired. Normal sleep SG: from 21:00 to 6:00
SG can not spend the night here, too dangerous a place. Need to find a special place to stay.

You just used the personal heat exchanger. Now that you have laid your objects in the recovery, some stalkers will look into this box. If stalkers will have to like the contents of the box, they take him away, and you keep the money.

For the replenishment of parts, put it in a safe weapon, armor, or artifact. And then, to talk to the mechanic. Position status is not critical, but if you put the subject to the state of the strength of more than 90%, the mechanic will get more parts.
GPS-Guide does not work on this area.
Malfunction of doors - got burned all the electronics. Need a special key.
This bandit strong defense of gunshot wounds, try to get closer.
Safe is secure. Need a key.
